report.title: My Sites Lookup
report.description: A list of sites I've created, or added to my list of sites (a custom person attribute). No site summary information returned.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt ON lt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav ON pav.person_attribute_id=#person_site_attr_id# AND pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u ON u.person_id=pav.person_id AND u.id=#user_id# #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (l.created_by_id=#user_id# OR u.id IS NOT NULL)

param.name: person_site_attr_id
param.description: The person attribute ID used to store My Sites

column.name: created_by_user
column.sql: CASE l.created_by_id WHEN #user_id# THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: linked_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN pav.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END
